Projects

Battleship Game

An interactive implementation of the Battleship game with dynamic board updates, ship placements, and turn-based gameplay. Built with HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Webpack, and Jest.

Weather App

Weather app that displays the user's location on page load and allows searching for a location for current weather conditions. Built using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Webpack, Weather API and ip-api.

To-Do List

To-do list app with project and task management, including task details, priority levels, and deadlines. Offers local storage. Built with HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, and Webpack.

Tic-Tac-Toe

An implementation of Tic-Tac-Toe game. Built with HTML, JSS, and Vanilla Javascript.
